props.name: gradientTransform
props.desc: A transform matrix to apply to the gradient before painting. Imported from svg gradients, is not applied with the current transform in the center. Before this transform is applied, the origin point is at the top left corner of the object plus the addition of offsetY and offsetX.

props.name: gradientUnits
props.desc: coordinates units for coords. If `pixels`, the number of coords are in the same unit of width / height. If set as `percentage` the coords are still a number, but 1 means 100% of width for the X and 100% of the height for the y. It can be bigger than 1 and negative. allowed values pixels or percentage.

props.name: offsetX
props.desc: Horizontal offset for aligning gradients coming from SVG when outside pathgroups

props.name: offsetY
props.desc: Vertical offset for aligning gradients coming from SVG when outside pathgroups

props.name: toObject
props.desc: Returns object representation of a gradient

props.name: toSVG
props.desc: Returns SVG representation of an gradient
